Text: Summer Associate MentorSummer Associate Program is a critical component of our recruiting efforts We appreciate you acting as a Mentor for the following Summer Associate Vince A reception to introduce you to the Summer Associates is scheduled for June nd The reception will be held from PM until PM at Sierras Grill located at Montrose We have also provided the Summer Associate with your name and phone number however we encourage you to contact Guiseppe prior to the reception if possible Please RSVP your attendance to Cheryl Kuehl at x or by email Thank you Charlene Jackson
